groups.name: branchMapping

inputs.name: connectionId
inputs.label: Host Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the host connection associated with a CES URL. Host connections with CES url can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: operationType
inputs.label: Perform :
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select either Code Pipeline operations or Git to Code Pipeline Sync

inputs.name: cesUrl
inputs.label: CES URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the CES URL. Host connections with CES url can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication :
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select either CES Token or PFX Certificate

inputs.name: cesSecretToken
inputs.label: CES secret token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The available CES secret token to perform Code Pipeline actions for Rest API call. In this feild, please pass pipeline variable name which is storing CES secret token as secret in Azure pipeline. Example $(cesToken).

inputs.name: keyvaultName
inputs.label: Key Vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault

inputs.name: certificateName
inputs.label: Certificate Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of certificate as added in Keyvault

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Code Pipeline action to be performed

inputs.name: buildAutomatically
inputs.label: buildAutomatically (if applicable)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field when set to True will automatically build Task/Assignment from automaticBuildParams.txt generated by sync operation

inputs.name: request
inputs.label: Request
inputs.defaultValue:

inputs.name: skipWaitingForSetCompletion
inputs.label: Skip waiting for the completion of the set (if applicable)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This allows to turn on / off polling a set to wait for the job finish if it is applicable.

inputs.name: showResponseBodyInConsole
inputs.label: Show Response body in console
inputs.helpMarkDown: This allows you to turn off writing the response body to the log.

inputs.name: trustAllCerts
inputs.label: Trust all Certificates
inputs.helpMarkDown:
This allows you to trust self-signed server certificates.
>Enabling this is not recommended.

inputs.name: windowsWorkbenchCliHome
inputs.label: Windows Workbench CLI Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the path of installed Workbench CLI on Windows machine. This can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: linuxWorkbenchCliHome
inputs.label: Linux Workbench CLI Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the path of installed Workbench CLI on Linux machine. This can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: runtimeConfiguration
inputs.label: Runtime Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Code Pipeline runtime configuration.

inputs.name: authenticationTypeIspwSync
inputs.label: Authentication :
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select either Username-Password or PFX Certificate

inputs.name: ispwusername
inputs.label: User Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Code Pipeline user name.

inputs.name: ispwpassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Code Pipeline user password. The recommended way to set secret variables are in a variable group. For eaxmple, $(ispw.password).

inputs.name: keyvaultNameIspwSync
inputs.label: Key vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault

inputs.name: certificateNameIspwSync
inputs.label: Certificate Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of certificate as added in Keyvault

inputs.name: stream
inputs.label: Stream
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Code Pipeline Stream name.

inputs.name: application
inputs.label: Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Code Pipeline Application name.

inputs.name: subApplication
inputs.label: Sub Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Specify the Code Pipeline Sub Application name.

inputs.name: yamlMappingFile
inputs.label: YAML Mapping File
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Relative path of Code Pipeline YAML configuration file to GIT repository root. If not set, default to {repository.root}/ispwconfig.yml

inputs.name: encryptionProtocol
inputs.label: Encryption protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the encryption protocol.

inputs.name: codePage
inputs.label: Code Page
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the code page.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Read/write timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the read/write timeout.

inputs.name: branchMapping
inputs.label: Branch Mapping
inputs.helpMarkDown:
###The following mappings show how to use the 'Branch Mapping' field.
 - **/dev1 => DEV1, per-commit
 - **/dev2 => DEV2, per-branch
 - **/dev3 => DEV3, custom, a description
 ####Each mapping has three possible fields which should be separated by commas.
[Click here for more information.](https://github.com/bmc-compuware/ispw-operations-azure-extension/blob/master/help.md#git-to-ispw-sync)
